reviews.text: There is seating and shelter but there is a strong smell of urine which is not nice to sit by at all

This is a small train station positioned in Sarn. The trains here run from Cardiff before terminating at Maesteg. Sarn station is one of convenience rather than luxury so don't expect too much in the way of amenities. It's also unfortunately placed at the bottom of a huge hill, on the plus side there's often taxis waiting on arrival.
Just a small village train station. Very efficient when travelling to. Maesteg or Cardiff

Small train station with no ticket facility.  Trains from here go to Cheltenham Spa passing through, Bridgend, Cardiff, Newport and Gloucester or further up the valley to Maesteg. Please note no toilet facilities here but good out of town parking.
Its small but is a relly good place and it not to many pepole there most of the time
